醜怪: (しゅうかい) - monstrous; hideous; ugly; bizarre
醜悪: (shuuaku) - feio, feio, horrível, maldoso, repulsivo, vergonhoso
醜態: (shuutai) - comportamento vergonhoso, comportamento vergonhoso, visão vergonhosa
醜状: (しゅうじょう) - disgraceful state of affairs
醜男: (じこお) - ugly man; (じこお only) strong, brawny man
醜行: (しゅうこう) - disgraceful (scandalous) conduct; shameful behavior; shameful behaviour
醜語: (しゅうご) - swear word/dirty word; coprolalia
醜語症: (しゅうごしょう) - coprolalia; uncontrollable use of obscene language
醢汁: (しょっつる) - salted and fermented fish sauce from Akita
醤: (しょう) - Um tipo de missô, pasta semelhante ao missô feita a partir do mofo koji e água salgada; purê aguado restante da produção de shoyu
醤油炒め: (しょうゆいため) - fried dish seasoned with soy sauce
醤油皿: (しょうゆざら) - soy sauce dish
醤油粕: (しょうゆかす) - soy sauce lees; soy sauce cake
醤油顔: (しょうゆがお) - typically Japanese face
醪: (ろう) - Sake Não Refinado ou Shoyu
醬油: (しょゆう) - (しょゆ, しょゆう are dial.) soy sauce; shoyu
醴泉: (れいせん) - spring of sweet water
醸しだす: (かもしだす) - to engender; to bring about
醸し出す: (kamoshidasu) - to create (uma atmosfera, sensação, etc.), to produce, to engender
醸す: (かもす) - to brew (sake, etc.); to cause/to bring on/to bring about/to give rise to
醸造アルコール: (じょうぞうアルコール) - distilled alcohol (sometimes added in the production of sake)
醸造業: (じょうぞうぎょう) - brewing industry
醺然: (くんぜん) - appearing drunk and cheerful
釁る: (ちぬる) - to smear with blood; to kill
采の目: (さいのめ) - pip (spot on a die); small cube (esp. of food)/die/dice
采六: (さいろく) - kid/brat; Edo term used to debase people from Kansai
采女佑: (うねめのしょう) - high-ranking staff member in the Office of Court Ladies (ritsuryo system)
采女司: (うねめし) - Office of Court Ladies (ritsuryo system)
采女正: (うねめのかみ) - director of the Office of Court Ladies (ritsuryo system)
采振木: (ザイフリボク) - Asian serviceberry (Amelanchier asiatica); shadberry; juneberry; shadbush; shadblow
采配を振る: (さいはいをふる) - to lead; to direct; to take command
采配を振るう: (さいはいをふるう) - to wield a baton/to swing a baton; to lead/to direct/to command
釈典: (しゃくてん) - Buddhist sutras; Buddhist literature
釈尊: (しゃくそん) - Sakyamuni (sage of the Sakyas)
釈然: (せきぜん) - fully satisfied; well satisfied (e.g. with an explanation or apology); to have one's heart completely cleared of doubt or grudge
釈然とする: (しゃくぜんとする) - to be fully satisfied with (e.g. an explanation or apology)
釈空海: (しゃくくうかい) - Kukai (name of a Buddhist priest)
釈義: (しゃくぎ) - exegesis; explanation of a text; commentary on a text
釈義学: (しゃくぎがく) - exegesis/explanation of a text/commentary on a text; study of biblical interpretation
釈迦: (shaka) - Gautama Buda, Shakyamuni, o Buda histórico
釈迦に説法: (しゃかにせっぽう) - teaching your grandmother to suck eggs; teaching something to someone who knows more than you; preaching to the choir; lecturing to the Buddha
釈迦三尊: (しゃかさんぞん) - image of Gautama Buddha flanked by two attendants
釈迦占地: (シャカシメジ) - Lyophyllum fumosum (species of mushroom)
釈迦如来: (しゃかにょらい) - Sakyamuni (sage of the Sakyas)
釈迦牟尼: (shakamuni) - Gautama Buddha, Shakyamuni, the historical Buddha (Século V a.C.?)
里: (ri/sato) - village , village, hamlet; countryside, country; home (of one's parents, etc.), hometown; one's origins, one's upbringing, one's past
里ことば: (さとことば) - countryside dialect; sociolect or secret language used by prostitutes in red-light districts during the Edo period
里内裏: (さとだいり) - imperial palace temporarily built outside of the great imperial palace (Heian period)
里山: (satoyama) - bosque não desenvolvido perto de área povoada; padrão de assentamento de viver em vales altos e cultivar encostas mais baixas
里帰り: (さとがえり) - returning home; visiting one's parents; new bride's first visit to parents
里帰り出産: (さとがえりしゅっさん) - returning to one's parent's house to give birth; giving birth at one's parent's home
里帰り展: (さとがえりてん) - exhibition of returned works (e.g. from overseas)
里帰出産: (さとがえりしゅっさん) - returning to one's parent's house to give birth; giving birth at one's parent's home
里桜: (さとざくら) - any oriental variety of cherry tree descended from the Oshima cherry
里犬: (さといぬ) - (ant: 山犬・2) pet dog; domesticated dog
里神楽: (さとかぐら) - kagura performance held somewhere other than the imperial palace
里芋科: (さといもか) - Araceae; arum family of plants
